sleeping pills
diet pills

antibiotics/aspirin/codeine etc

capsule
a small tube-shaped container with medicine inside that you swallow whole

a small smooth pill that is slightly longer than it is wide – used especially on bottles and containers

liquid medicine that you put into your eye or ear
